name: Dream Mirror Hypnagogia
desc: Choose 1 "Dream Mirror of Joy" and 1 "Dream Mirror of Terror" from your hand and/or Deck, and place 1 in your Field Zone and the other in your opponent's Field Zone, face-up. You can only activate 1 "Dream Mirror Hypnagogia" per turn.
str1: Select the card to place on your field
str2: Select the card to place on your opponent's field
